channel.title: CVE Feed for mercurius-js -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mercurius-js -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22477|2024-08-02T10:13:48.466Z -- mercurius-js -- mercurius
item.description: Mercurius is a GraphQL adapter for Fastify. Any users of Mercurius until version 10.5.0 are subjected to a denial of service attack by sending a malformed packet over WebSocket to `/graphql`. This issue was patched in #940. As a workaround, users can disable subscriptions.
